flavor: The sailors along the docks of Innsmouth eye you with suspicion as you depart. The lighthouse beacon at the top of the nearby cliffside provides your only illumination as you head deeper into the fog.
name: Secrets of the Sea (v. I)
text: As an additional cost for you to move from one [[Ocean]]地點 to another while not in a vehicle, you must spend 2 actions. 強制 - 在你回合開始時，如果你在完全淹沒的地點，你奮力掙扎，求取空氣：在你回合結束時，if you did not enter an unflooded location, partially flooded location, or a vehicle during your turn, take 5 direct damage.

flavor: "It's got us in its grip! It ain't goin' nowhere. Now's your chance!"
name: The Terror of Devil Reef
text: 生成 - Fishing Vessel's location. 獵手。龐大。反擊。 The Terror of Devil Reef cannot enter [[洞穴]]地點s. The Terror of Devil Reef gets +3 [per_investigator] health.

name: The Terror of Devil Reef
text: 生成 - Fishing Vessel's location. 獵手。龐大。反擊。 The Terror of Devil Reef cannot enter [[洞穴]]地點s. 強制 - When The Terror of Devil Reef would be defeated: Instead, remove all damage from it and exhaust it. It cannot ready for the remainder of the round (including the upkeep phase).

back_flavor:
"We've gotta pull back!" Mr. Moore shouts over the roar of the waves. "The sea's too rough, and the tide's gettin' worse by the minute! Stay out here any longer an' we'll capsize fer sure!"
You protest, but the captain is right. The weather has gotten so bad Mr. Moore can barely control the ship. Worse yet, in just a matter of hours the tide has begun to swallow the coastal islands, leaving little for you to investigate. You nod to the captain, frustrated. This will have to do for now.
back_text: 在冒險日誌中，記錄the tide has grown stronger. (→結局1)
flavor: Now you know why none dare venture near the black reefs. It's not just the strange sightings on the islands - there is something far older and more horrifying that dwells under the waves...
name: The Devil of the Depths
text: As an additional cost for you to move from one [[Ocean]]地點 to another while not in a vehicle, you must spend 2 actions. 強制 - 在你回合開始時，如果你在完全淹沒的地點，你奮力掙扎，求取空氣：在你回合結束時，if you did not enter an unflooded location, partially flooded location, or a vehicle during your turn, take 5 direct damage.

back_flavor: Confident that you've found enough evidence of the Order's activities, you head back to the coast. You'd much rather continue your investigation on dry land.
flavor: Somewhere in these accursed reefs, the 達貢密教 is hiding something big... but what?
name: Reef of Mysteries
text: Keys can only be claimed from [[Y'ha-nthlei]]地點s using the [free] ability on those locations. 目標 - Find and claim as many of the following keys as you can from [[Y'ha-nthlei]]地點s (purple, white, and black)。If you control all 3 of these keys, 推進場景。

back_text: Churning Waters enters play fully flooded (even while it is unrevealed).
back_flavor: "And far out at sea, despite a high tide, I glimpsed a long, black line scarcely rising above the water yet carrying a suggestion of odd latent malignancy." - H. P. 洛夫克拉夫特，《印斯茅斯之影》
name: Churning Waters
text: [action] If you are in the Fishing Vessel：撤退。每位調查員 in the Fishing Vessel resigns. Remove Fishing Vessel from the game. Each resigning investigator places each of their purple, black, or white keys on the current act. All other investigators are left to fend for themselves.

name: Fishing Vessel
text:
載具.
While you are in this vehicle, treat your location as if it were unflooded.
[action]：Move Fishing Vessel to a connecting [[Ocean]]地點.

name: Waveworn Idol
text: [reaction] After your location's flood level changes, or after a [[深潛者]]敵人 spawns at your location, exhaust Waveworn Idol: Immediately take an action as if it were your turn (this action does not count toward the number of actions you can take each turn).

name: Awakened Mantle
text: [free] 如果你所在地點已淹沒，exhaust Awakened Mantle: Move to a connecting location that is also flooded.

name: Headdress of Y'ha-nthlei
text: You get +1 skill value while investigating a flooded location or while attacking or evading an enemy at a flooded location.

name: Deep One Predator
text: 獵手。 強制 - After Deep One Predator與你交戰後： Move 1 of your clues or keys to Deep One Predator. 強制 - When you defeat or evade Deep One Predator: Take control of all of its clues and keys.
traits: 類人. 怪物. 深潛者

name: Hunting Deep One
text: 獵手。 While Hunting Deep One is engaged with you, you cannot enter vehicles or gain resources. 強制 - After Hunting Deep One與你交戰後： If you are not in a vehicle, lose 2 resources. If you are in a vehicle, leave your 載具.
traits: 類人. 怪物. 深潛者

name: Shapes in the Water
text: 顯現 - 檢定[willpower](2)。如果你檢定失敗，受到2點恐懼。 This test gets +1 difficulty 如果你所在地點已淹沒 (+2 difficulty instead if it is fully flooded).

name: Aquatic Ambush
text: 顯現 - 將Aquatic Ambush放置入場，放到密謀牌堆旁邊。 強制 - When you reveal a chaos token while attacking an enemy at a flooded location: Reveal an additional chaos token. (Max once per test.) 強制 - 當一輪結束時：從場上丟棄1張Aquatic Ambush。(每輪最多一張。)

name: Horrors from the Deep
text: 顯現 - 檢定[agility](2)。如果你檢定失敗，受到2點傷害。 This test gets +1 difficulty 如果你所在地點已淹沒 (+2 difficulty instead if it is fully flooded).

name: Stowaway
text: 顯現 - If no investigators are in a vehicle, Stowaway 獲得湧動。 否則，每位調查員 in a vehicle must either 受到1點傷害 and 1點恐懼 or leave that 載具. 每位調查員 who left a vehicle cannot enter that vehicle for the remainder of the round.

name: Dragged Under
text: 顯現 - 將Dragged Under放置入場，放到你的威脅區域。 If you are in a vehicle, leave it. You cannot enter vehicles. [action]：檢定[combat](3)或[agility](3)。如果你檢定成功，discard Dragged Under.
